definition: HDB flats/public apartment flats (in Singapore and Malaysia)
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: Stay in 2-room rental flat, or smaller.
sentences.chinese: 住租賃組屋2房式或更小。

sentences.english: HDB flats could have been much cheaper if it's not a market price subsidy.
sentences.chinese: 組屋公寓如果不按市場價來的話可以便宜得多。

sentences.english: The majority of the Singaporeans lives in high-rise apartment blocks that was built by the government.
sentences.chinese: 大多數新加坡人居住在政府建造的組屋。

sentences.english: Although it is only a normal three-room flat.
sentences.chinese: 雖然，只是一間很普通的三房式組屋。

sentences.english: To them, familiar faces seem to be mere living props in the drama of HDB life.
sentences.chinese: 對於他們，這些熟面孔也只不過是組屋生活的活道具。

definition: public/publicly (owned, financed, operated etc)/run by the state
one bedroom and one living room
to consult and act upon/privately run/commercial
